item.title: Trump says China trade deal 'done,' but subject to 'final approval'
item.description: Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick said it was a "handshake for a framework."

item.title: White House, Texas Republicans weigh redistricting to protect GOP House majority
item.description: President Donald Trump's political operation has approached Texas Republicans about redrawing the Texas congressional map.
